Text: The Man They Could Not Hang is a 1939 horror film, the first of three similarly-plotted titles produced by Columbia Pictures, directed by Nick Grinde, and starring Boris Karloff as Dr. Henryk Savaard.

Text: The Man They Could Not Hang:  The supporting cast features Lorna Gray and Ann Doran.
